alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Nelson (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 6:52PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Grand Forks and eastern Nelson Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 652 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of McVille, or 37 miles southeast of Devils Lake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Michigan around 710 PM CDT. Petersburg around 715 PM CDT. Niagara around 720 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern North Dakota.
